author: bridge-bot
content: <shemnon> I'd like to get a tempurature check on the call for a gas model for memory that is paged instead of linear.

author: bridge-bot
content: <raxhvl> One use case is that this makes garbage collection in high level language easier, one strategy could be to write ephemeral variables to a specific page that can be periodically cleaned up (re @shemnon: I'd like to get a tempurature check on the call for a gas model for memory that is paged instead of linear.)
